short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple productive tool that reminds user to open the URL later (extremely useful, I swear). Update on 2016-09-05

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you to remind yourself an URL and open it later automatically. You can easily set:
- In half an hour
- In an hour
- Later today
- Later tomorrow

And many more.

There are many extensions like this, but most of them no longer works.

Enjoy and give me some feedback at https://photoreminder.net/contact/. Thank you!

PWS team: Phong Lam

--- RELEASE NOTES ---

New release for V 1.1.25:
- Update content
- Disable clipboard and selected note (this one is useless and annoying)
- Update icon

New releases for V 1.1.24:
- Fix some bugs
- Select all note content when opening popup
- Remove recent note after setting reminder by right click

- Fix bugs
- Update screenshot

New releases for V1.1.22:
- Fix repeating error
- Optimize speed
- Allow to copy current note to clipboard
- Set time to open a link from 30s to 60s
- Right click for setting reminder quickly


New releases for V1.1.21:
- Fix “alert” annoyance
- Not open new tabs of Chrome currently opens over 9 tabs

- Limit height of reminder lists

Fix some big bugs
